mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SEND_MESSAGE (ID, RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_ID) VALUES (#{id}, #{receiverId}, #{senderId})
mapper.select: SELECT sm.ID AS messageId, sm.SENDER_ID AS senderId, sm.RECEIVER_ID AS receiverId, m.MESSAGE_ALL_CONTENT AS content, m.MESSAGE_ALL_DATE AS sendDate FROM TBL_SEND_MESSAGE sm JOIN TBL_MESSAGE m ON sm.ID = m.ID WHERE sm.ID = #{messageId}

SELECT SM.ID AS ID, SM.SENDER_ID AS SENDER_ID, SM.RECEIVER_ID AS RECEIVER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS RECEIVER_NICKNAME, MSG.MESSAGE_ALL_CONTENT AS CONTENT, TO_CHAR(MSG.MESSAGE_ALL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS SEND_DATE FROM TBL_SEND_MESSAGE SM JOIN TBL_MESSAGE MSG ON SM.ID = MSG.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON SM.RECEIVER_ID = M.ID WHERE SM.SENDER_ID = #{sender_id} ORDER BY MSG.MESSAGE_ALL_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_SEND_MESSAGE WHERE SENDER_ID = #{senderId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT SM.ID AS ID, SM.SENDER_ID AS SENDER_ID, SM.RECEIVER_ID AS RECEIVER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS RECEIVER_NICKNAME, MSG.MESSAGE_ALL_CONTENT AS CONTENT, TO_CHAR(MSG.MESSAGE_ALL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS SEND_DATE FROM TBL_SEND_MESSAGE SM JOIN TBL_MESSAGE MSG ON SM.ID = MSG.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON SM.RECEIVER_ID = M.ID WHERE SM.SENDER_ID = #{senderId} ORDER BY MSG.MESSAGE_ALL_DATE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{startRow} + #{rowCount} ) WHERE RNUM > #{startRow}
